title: Muthoot Finance skids 5% on flattish rise in Q3 profit, broader market selloff - Economic Times
content: Muthoot Finance skids 5% on flattish rise in Q3 profit, broader market selloff  Economic Times
description: India's largest gold financing company, by loan portfolio, said rural India accounts for about 65 per cent of total gold stock in the country, and the large portion of the rural population had limited access to credit, PTI reported.
